Shipping Policy

Last Updated: November 12, 2025

1. Shipping Days & Processing Time

Orders are processed and shipped Monday through Friday, excluding holidays.

  • Processing Time: 1-2 business days
  • Standard Shipping: 3-7 business days after processing
  • Expedited Shipping: 2-3 business days after processing

Orders placed on weekends or holidays will be processed on the next business day.

2. Shipping Methods

We offer the following shipping options:

  • Standard Shipping: USPS First Class or Priority Mail
  • Expedited Shipping: USPS Priority Mail Express or FedEx 2-Day
  • International Shipping: Available to select countries (contact us for details)

3. Shipping Costs

Shipping costs are calculated based on the weight of your order, destination, and selected shipping method. The total shipping cost will be displayed at checkout before you complete your purchase.

  • Orders over $200 qualify for free standard shipping (domestic US only)
  • International orders are subject to customs fees and import duties (buyer's responsibility)

4. Order Tracking

Once your order ships, you will receive a shipping confirmation email with a tracking number. You can track your package using:

  • The tracking link provided in your confirmation email
  • Our Track Order page
  • Your account dashboard

5. Shipping Address

Please ensure your shipping address is accurate and complete. We are not responsible for orders shipped to incorrect addresses provided by the customer.

Note: We cannot ship to P.O. Boxes for expedited shipping options.

6. International Shipping

International shipping is available to select countries. Please note:

  • Delivery times vary by destination (typically 7-21 business days)
  • Customers are responsible for all customs fees, duties, and taxes
  • Some products may be restricted in certain countries
  • Orders may be subject to additional customs inspections

7. Delivery Issues

If your package is lost, damaged, or delayed, please contact us immediately at:

Email: customerservice@lifelinkreresearch.com
Phone: +1 714-622-7899

We will work with the carrier to resolve the issue. For lost packages, we may file a claim with the shipping carrier on your behalf.

8. Packaging & Handling

All peptide products are carefully packaged to maintain product integrity during transit. Temperature-sensitive items may be shipped with ice packs or insulated packaging.

Important: Products should be stored properly upon receipt according to the storage instructions provided.

9. Undeliverable Packages

If a package is returned to us as undeliverable due to an incorrect address or failed delivery attempts, you will be responsible for additional shipping charges to reship the order.

10. Contact Information

For shipping inquiries, please contact:

Evans Peptides Customer Service
30 N Gould St Ste N
Sheridan, WY 82801
Email: customerservice@lifelinkreresearch.com
Phone: +1 714-622-7899
Hours: Monday - Friday (Except Holidays)
